title: 自定义怪物（2）
author: Stray51
txt_content: 怎么让骷髅穿着盔甲，骑着蜘蛛，蜘蛛上还另外有一只流浪者，而且是他们都有隐身效果。

replies.author: pineapple_
replies.txt_content:
这个效果只有1.9以上能实现
用1.12当例子了
/summon spider ~ ~ ~ {ActiveEffects:[{Id:14,Duration:2147483647,Amplifier:1,ShowParticles:0b}],Passengers:[{id:"minecraft:skeleton",ActiveEffects:[{id:14,Duration:2147483647,Amplifier:1,ShowParticles:0b}],ArmorItems:[{},{},{id:"minecraft:diamond_cheatplate",Count:1b},{}]},{id:"minecraft:stray",ActiveEffects:[{id:14,Duration:2147483647,Amplifiers:1,ShowParticles:0b}]}]}复制代码
